name: Artifact (itch) (Svartskogen)
description:
Controls:
WASD: Movement
E: Harvest bush
Left Click: Attack

Defend your Artifact from the waves of wolves!

A resource based game where you must defend a strange alien Artifact which feeds of biomater.

Keep the Artifact health up by feeding it with fruits from bushes, also keep those orange wolves away from them.

Made in 72hs for Ludum Dare 46 / Torneo GJA ronda 1
Theme: Keep it alive
